episodes.name: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: Preview of the upcoming first season.

episodes.name: A Look Ahead
episodes.overview: Showrunners Jon Bokenkamp and John Eisendrath along with Co-Executive Producer Lukas Reiter give us a few tantalizing hints of what's to come for Red, Liz and the task force in Season 2.

episodes.name: Behind the Blacklist: Season 2
episodes.overview: Hosted by Amir Arison, “Behind The Blacklist: Season II” is a fun peek behind the curtain of this international television hit, presented through entertaining interviews with cast and creators sharing their “insider” stories, and exciting clip packages that feature everything fans love about THE BLACKLIST -- incredible action, colorful villains, evolving characters, unpredictable storylines, and edge-of-your-seat suspense. The special will conclude with the world-premiere of an eye popping :90 trailer, which will exclusively utilize new footage.

episodes.name: Season 5: First Look (Sneak Peek)
episodes.overview: James Spader, Megan Boone, Harry Lennix and Ryan Eggold share a preview of what's coming up on Season 5 of The Blacklist, premiering Wednesday, September 27 at 8/7c on NBC.

episodes.name: Comic-Con@Home 2020: The Blacklist
episodes.overview: Executive producers and cast, along with animators from Proof, Inc., discuss how producing a partially animated episode—amid the challenges of working remotely—allowed them to complete Season 7 after production was shut down due to COVID-19.

episodes.name: Like Father Like Daughter
episodes.overview: An overview and look at the similarities between Raymond "Red" Reddington and Elizabeth Keen AKA Masha Rostova.

episodes.name: A Darker Shade of Red
episodes.overview: A look into the dark side of Raymond "Red" Reddington.

episodes.name: Mr Kaplan: End of an era
episodes.overview: A look at the end of Mr Kaplan

episodes.name: The Insider: Behind the Scenes of Season One
Behind the Blacklist: Anslo Garrick: Conclusion (s01e10)
Behind the Blacklist: The Good Samaritan (s01e11)
Behind the Blacklist: The Cyprus Agency (s01e13)
Behind the Blacklist: The Pavlovich Brothers (s01e19)
Building a Blacklister: Vanessa Cruz
episodes.overview: A look behind the scenes while developing the Blacklister 'Vanessa Cruz'

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A criminal mastermind surrenders to the FBI with a stunning offer - but he'll only talk to a rookie profiler.

episodes.name: The Freelancer
episodes.overview: Liz and Red track an assassin who disguises his kills in large-scale catastrophes.

episodes.name: Wujing
episodes.overview: Liz and Red go undercover to take down an assassin who's been decimating the ranks of the CIA.

episodes.name: The Stewmaker
episodes.overview: When Liz's key witness disappears, Red suspects a killer who literally stews his victims, making them disappear forever...

episodes.name: The Courier
episodes.overview: A sinister middleman with a unique ability puts the FBI on the trail of a missing NSA analyst.

episodes.name: Gina Zanetakos
episodes.overview: Eager to clear Tom's name, Liz turns him in to the FBI.

episodes.name: Frederick Barnes
episodes.overview: Following a chemical attack on the subway, Liz and the team hunt a mad scientist.

episodes.name: General Ludd
episodes.overview: Liz and the FBI go after an anti-capitalist cabal that's intent on bringing the U.S. economy to its knees.

episodes.name: Anslo Garrick
episodes.overview: An assassination attempt on Red brings the FBI under siege.

episodes.name: Anslo Garrick: Conclusion
episodes.overview: Liz and a mysterious stranger fight to save Red and Ressler.

episodes.name: The Good Samaritan
episodes.overview: A serial killer from Liz's past strikes again while Red hunts for his betrayer.

episodes.name: The Alchemist
episodes.overview: The FBI's next target protects the guilty by preying on the DNA of the innocent.

episodes.name: The Cyprus Agency
episodes.overview: On the eve of Liz's adoption, Red puts her on the trail of an adoption agency gone evil.

episodes.name: Madeline Pratt
episodes.overview: A femme fatale from Red's past leads the FBI on a snipe hunt.

episodes.name: The Judge
episodes.overview: The FBI pursues a Blacklister who metes out "justice" for those who are wrongly imprisoned.

episodes.name: Mako Tanida
episodes.overview: As a Yakuza crime lord seeks deadly revenge on Ressler Tom and Jolene face off.

episodes.name: Ivan
episodes.overview: While chasing a cyber-terrorist, Liz investigates Jolene's disappearance.

episodes.name: Milton Bobbit
episodes.overview: Red and the team search for a life insurance claim adjuster who talks people into becoming contract killers; Liz and Red try to uncover Tom's secrets.

episodes.name: The Pavlovich Brothers
episodes.overview: While the FBI searches for a Serbian family of kidnappers, Red uses them in a scheme to out Tom, leading to a fateful confrontation with Liz.

episodes.name: The Kingmaker
episodes.overview: As the FBI pursues a political fixer known as The Kingmaker, Red seeks Fitch's protection against an unknown enemy who's trying to take him down.

episodes.name: Berlin
episodes.overview: After discovering the truth behind her father's death, Liz refuses to work with Red, just as his situation grows desperate.

episodes.name: Berlin: Conclusion
episodes.overview: With the crashing of the mysterious prisoner transport plane, the city is on lock down as the authorities are on the hunt for all the escapees. Meanwhile, with Red  in custody, Liz uses her power to get him out since he is their best chance at finding all the suspects. Elsewhere, their main objective is to track down Berlin, a prisoner on the plane who is somehow involved.

episodes.name: Lord Baltimore
episodes.overview: While continuing to battle Berlin, Red faces a new threat in the form of Lord Baltimore. A figure from Red's past returns. Liz tries to move on after her showdown with Tom.

episodes.name: Monarch Douglas Bank
episodes.overview: A robbery provides Red with an opportunity to take down a questionable bank. Liz questions Red's intentions during the course of her investigation. An impressive addition is made to Cooper's team.

episodes.name: Dr. James Covington
episodes.overview: When a body is found missing a heart, Liz and Ressler join forces with Samar Navabi to investigate Dr. Covington's operation. Red and an associate try to take advantage of an opportunity in Indonesia.

episodes.name: Dr. Linus Creel
episodes.overview: Red thinks a dangerous sociopsychological experiment may be taking place when several previously nonviolent citizens become killers. Red has a complicated proposition for Naomi and her husband.

episodes.name: The Front
episodes.overview: The team targets an eco-terrorist cell seeking a deadly weapon. Liz attempts to lose her guardian. Red resorts to manipulation to pursue a special someone.

episodes.name: The Mombasa Cartel
episodes.overview: Liz asks Red for information about deadly wildlife poachers after a mutilated corpse washes ashore. Ressler forms a dangerous habit.

episodes.name: The Scimitar
episodes.overview: A plot for revenge emerges after an Iranian nuclear scientist is assassinated. Liz and Ressler wind up in a predicament.

episodes.name: The Decembrist
episodes.overview: Red’s motives for Berlin take a sudden turn when he learns Berlin was manipulated by the latest Blacklister to avenge Red. Red and Berlin travel to Moscow to track down a high ranking Russian official who they believe is responsible. Liz struggles to keep her secret from unraveling.

episodes.name: Luther Braxton
episodes.overview: When Red is arrested and taken to a secret detention facility, Liz and the task force set out to save him before he disappears forever. At the facility, Red encounters a thief with whom he shares a complicated history.

episodes.name: Luther Braxton: Conclusion
episodes.overview: As chaos ensues at the Factory, leaving the fate of Red and the task force unknown, Cooper struggles to rescue his team from the detention facility. It’s a race against time to prevent Luther Braxton attaining confidential information.

episodes.name: Ruslan Denisov
episodes.overview: When an undercover CIA agent is kidnapped by a band of separatists in Uzbekistan, the task force sets a rescue mission in motion. Red informs Liz and Ressler that they are up against a very dangerous former associate.

episodes.name: The Kenyon Family
episodes.overview: When Red tips Liz off about the disappearance of a polygamous cult leader with dangerous shipping containers buried on his property, the task force sets out to investigate. Red utilizes his sources to appease Fitch’s last words and tries to track down his hidden safe.

episodes.name: The Deer Hunter
episodes.overview: Red helps Liz and the task force find a killer — the Deer Hunter — who tracks victims like prey. Meanwhile, the local DC police suspect the city Harbormaster was murdered as Liz struggles to keep her secret from unraveling.

episodes.name: T. Earl King VI
episodes.overview: A former paramour involves Reddington in a deadly game with a wealthy, powerful family dynasty whose ill-begotten fortune was amassed from an underground auction of human and material contraband. Meanwhile, Tom takes on a new mission.

episodes.name: The Major
episodes.overview: When Agent Keen is questioned in court as a suspect in the murder of the DC Harbormaster, her unusual relationship with Red and their task force falls under scrutiny. Meanwhile, Red enlists Cooper and Ressler to locate “The Major,” a dangerous former associate who is key in keeping Liz out of prison.

episodes.name: Tom Keen
episodes.overview: As evidence mounts against Liz in the case of the murdered DC Harbormaster, a federal judge makes it clear to her that she will face severe criminal charges. Reddington and Ressler jump into high gear to exonerate Liz but the only solution is to find the recently vanished Tom Keen — wherever he may be operating in world.

episodes.name: The Longevity Initiative
episodes.overview: The task force tracks a scientist who abducts disabled patients to conduct experiments on immortality. Now back in Washington, DC, Tom scrambles to save himself from new enemies.

episodes.name: Vanessa Cruz
episodes.overview: The task force tracks a provocative female Blacklister, a frame-up artist who targets the wealthy elite. Tom pleads for Liz's help. Red pressures Liz for the Fulcrum, claiming it's now a matter of life and death.

episodes.name: Leonard Caul
episodes.overview: As Red fights for his life, he pleads with Liz to track down Nicholas Caul — a mysterious figure from his past with knowledge of The Fulcrum. It's a race against time for the task force to locate Caul before Red's life is threatened again, while Tom proves helpful in an unexpected way.

episodes.name: Quon Zhang
episodes.overview: After decoding the information that is embedded in The Fulcrum, Red is determined to stop the imminent threat. Meanwhile, the task force discovers that deceased bodies of Chinese-American women are being smuggled out of the country under false identities. Liz continues to search for answers about her past after discovering a picture hidden in Red's secret flat.

episodes.name: Karakurt
episodes.overview: Following intel from Red, the FBI find themselves one-step behind the most dangerous Russian Assassin, Karakurt, an enemy on U.S. soil. To avoid catastrophe, Liz and Ressler meet with Russian Counter-Intelligence who offer insight not only on Karakurt, but also on the identity of Liz’s mother. Cooper finds himself in a compromising position.

episodes.name: Tom Connolly
episodes.overview: Liz realizes she is being framed by The Cabal, forcing Red to use his connections to help her clear her name. As Cooper receives shocking news, Ressler, Samar, and Aram must decide who on the task force can still be trusted.

episodes.name: The Troll Farmer
episodes.overview: With the FBI hunting Liz for the murder of the attorney general, she and Red go on the run; Red reaches out to a contact for help fleeing the city.

episodes.name: Marvin Gerard
episodes.overview: With Ressler in hot pursuit, Liz only has Red to trust; Red asks a lawyer named Marvin Gerard for help with a hostage situation; the FBI wants to force Cooper out of the task force.

episodes.name: Eli Matchett
episodes.overview: Liz and Red take a detour towards the Midwest as part of their mission to exonerate Liz and defeat the Cabal. Ressler, Samar, and Aram continue to track the fugitives and in the process stumble upon what could become a global food crisis. Meanwhile, Cooper turns to an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: The Djinn
episodes.overview: Red enlists a task force to locate the Djinn, an enigmatic woman who fulfills revenge fantasies. Red and Liz believe the Djinn can lead them to the Cabal and help them exonerate Liz.

episodes.name: Arioch Cain
episodes.overview: Red and the FBI come together to protect Liz when a huge reward for her capture attracts attention from assassins.

episodes.name: Sir Crispin Crandall
episodes.overview: Red and Liz catch wind that Andras Halmi, a trusted advisor of The Director, has gone missing. In pursuit of Halmi, Red and Liz narrowly escape a violent confrontation. Meanwhile, Tom ends up in a brutal "Fight Club" to find the one man he thinks will be able to exonerate Liz.

episodes.name: Zal Bin Hasaan
episodes.overview: A family tragedy in Samar's past resurfaces when the Task Force hunt for an elusive international terrorist. The FBI and the Cabal gain significant ground in their search for Liz and Red. Meanwhile, Tom encounters complications in his plan to exonerate Liz.

episodes.name: Kings of the Highway
episodes.overview: Red and Liz are unexpectedly separated from each other when Red falls into a dangerous situation. Samar makes a risky decision to help Liz while Tom and Cooper continue on their expedition to exonerate Liz.

episodes.name: The Director
episodes.overview: While Red creates a crime scene to retrieve his care package, friends of the truth rally around Liz, whose life is in danger now that she is in custody.

episodes.name: The Director: Conclusion
episodes.overview: As The Cabal prepares to assassinate Liz, Red calls upon the task force to combine efforts to outmaneuver The Cabal to exonerate her. Red delivers a final ultimatum.

episodes.name: Mr. Gregory Devry
episodes.overview: With her name finally cleared, Liz attempts to reclaim her former life. Red works with the task force to infiltrate an assembly of high-level criminals at large in a rare, risky opportunity to capture the heads of the world's most lethal organized crime syndicates.

episodes.name: The Vehm
episodes.overview: When an associate of Red's is killed with a rare medieval device, Red realizes a lethal vigilante group from the Middle Ages has been resurrected; Liz considers her next move after receiving shocking news.

episodes.name: Alistair Pitt
episodes.overview: Red and Liz work with the taskforce to stop a negotiator who has resurfaced to unite two rival crime families. Tom reconnects with a former flame.

episodes.name: Lady Ambrosia
episodes.overview: After a missing child that has been presumed dead turns up alive, Red and Liz work with the taskforce to search for a dangerous woman who may be kidnapping children. Meanwhile, Tom faces shocking consequences after his plan to help Liz goes awry.

episodes.name: Drexel
episodes.overview: After the founder of a successful internet start-up is found dead, Red recognizes the crime scene as the work of a notorious killer. Liz and the task force work with Red to track the murderer through a dangerous underground news source. Meanwhile, Tom faces a life threatening situation, while Liz considers options for her baby.

episodes.name: The Caretaker
episodes.overview: After a State Department official is found dead in Beijing, Red and Liz link the murder to a secret keeper known as "The Caretaker," who maintains an impenetrable safety deposit vault for criminals. Red and Liz work with the task force to find the Caretaker and his collection of lethal and classified secrets. Meanwhile, Tom makes a risky decision, while Liz persists on her quest to find out more about her mother.

episodes.name: Mr. Solomon
episodes.overview: After Red learns that a tactical nuclear weapon is being targeted by thieves, it's a race against the clock as the task force struggles to stop them -- and prevent an imminent nuclear disaster. Meanwhile, Tom and Liz make a decision that will change their relationship forever.

episodes.name: Mr. Solomon: Conclusion
episodes.overview: After a tragedy puts a member of the team in grave danger, the task force must rely on Red and his unconventional methods to survive. Meanwhile, Tom and Liz face an unexpected complication that could affect their baby's future.

episodes.name: Cape May
episodes.overview: A mysterious beauty on the run from unknown assailants accidentally crosses paths with Reddington and enlists his help to fight back against her attackers.

episodes.name: The Artax Network
episodes.overview: After an unexpected loss devastates the FBI task force, they must track down their assailants; a mysterious group whose agents operate using a worldwide satellite network. Meanwhile, Reddington is forced to confront a ghost from his past -- one who knows many of Red's secrets.

episodes.name: Susan Hargrave
episodes.overview: When Reddington links an elegant, powerful and extremely dangerous woman to the recent tragic events, the task force is forced to play a deadly cat and mouse game to stop her before she strikes again.

episodes.name: Alexander Kirk
episodes.overview: The FBI task force's hunt for revenge nears its endgame. As Reddington and the team close in on the mysterious arch-criminal responsible for recent tragic events, they're forced to operate outside their comfort zone – and outside the law – in order to take down their enemy once and for all.

episodes.name: Alexander Kirk: Conclusion
episodes.overview: As Reddington and the task force close in on the person responsible for the recent tragedy, a shocking betrayal leaves them racing to save one of their own.

episodes.name: Esteban
episodes.overview: After Liz is abducted by a man claiming to be her father, Red sets out to find her at any cost. Meanwhile, the Task Force grapples with the shocking news that Liz is still alive.

episodes.name: Mato
episodes.overview: Red enlists Tom and the Task Force to help track a notorious bounty hunter who may know Alexander Kirk's next move. Meanwhile, Liz struggles to decide if Kirk is trustworthy.

episodes.name: Miles McGrath
episodes.overview: Red and the Task Force take extreme measures to hunt down one of Alexander Kirk's allies, Miles McGrath, a "criminal incubator" who finances crimes for profit. Meanwhile, Liz learns more about her family.

episodes.name: Gaia
episodes.overview: As Red sets Liz and the Task Force on the trail of an eco-terrorist with a mysterious connection to Alexander Kirk, Tom takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: The Lindquist Concern
episodes.overview: Liz's loyalties are tested as Red takes action on an operation to intercept Alexander Kirk. Meanwhile the Task Force races to find a killer who targets inventors of revolutionary technology.

episodes.name: The Thrushes
episodes.overview: When Alexander Kirk contracts with a mysterious group that specializes in hacking the world's most secure computer systems, Red and Liz see an opportunity to make a move on Kirk's organization.

episodes.name: Dr. Adrian Shaw
episodes.overview: Red directs the Task Force to track down an individual who provides new identities to criminals on the run. Meanwhile, as Alexander Kirk's medical condition worsens, Liz seeks guidance from Cooper on a crucial decision.

episodes.name: Dr. Adrian Shaw: Conclusion
episodes.overview: Red pressures Dr. Shaw to locate a former patient. Liz contemplates the implications of her ties to an increasingly desperate and dangerous Alexander Kirk. Mr. Kaplan comes to a critical realization about her future.

episodes.name: Lipet's Seafood Company
episodes.overview: An investigation into an international terrorist operating on American soil tests the allegiances of the Task Force. As Aram faces the consequences of his girlfriend hacking into the FBI computer systems, Red cashes in on a favor.

episodes.name: The Forecaster
episodes.overview: A new case arrives at Liz's doorstep, where someone has left a diorama depicting a crime soon to be committed. Meanwhile, Red explores a new business opportunity.

episodes.name: The Harem
episodes.overview: Liz must prove herself to the leader of an elite group of female thieves in order to infiltrate their organization as they prepare for their next heist. Meanwhile, Red contends with unexpected problems in his operations, and Tom channels his energy into fatherly duties.

episodes.name: Natalie Luca
episodes.overview: The Task Force chases an elusive assassin who kills by imparting a fatal disease on her victims. Meanwhile, Red enlists Tom for an undercover operation inside his criminal organization.

episodes.name: Isabella Stone
episodes.overview: The Task Force springs into action to find a sophisticated criminal who has been targeting Red's businesses. An unexpected event sets Tom on the hunt for information about his past.

episodes.name: The Architect
episodes.overview: Aram goes undercover as a hacker in order to identify a notorious criminal who for a price will design, construct and execute the perfect crime. Tom expands his search for missing details about his childhood, while Red takes action to locate the source of his compromised business operations.

episodes.name: The Apothecary
episodes.overview: After being dosed with a deadly poison, Red must retrace his steps to uncover who of his closest confidants has betrayed him. Meanwhile, Liz and the Task Force desperately search for the designer of the toxin in a race against time to save Red.

episodes.name: Dembe Zuma
episodes.overview: After weeks of hunting for Dembe, Red and the Task Force finally get a lead on his whereabouts when Aram goes missing. Meanwhile, Dembe takes a calculated risk as Red closes in.

episodes.name: Requiem
episodes.overview: Memories of the past set Red on a dangerous collision course with an enemy determined to destroy his criminal empire.

episodes.name: Philomena
episodes.overview: The Task Force chases an artful bounty hunter employed to target Red's closest associates. Ressler faces a moral dilemma when he takes on a new assignment with a former colleague.

episodes.name: Dr. Bogdan Krilov
episodes.overview: Red sets the Task Force on the trail of a Blacklister with the tools to manipulate memories, causing Liz to question her own experiences. As Gale intensifies his investigation, Ressler receives a new lead on the disappearance of Justice Department official Reven Wright.

episodes.name: The Debt Collector
episodes.overview: When Liz becomes the target of a mercenary known as the Debt Collector, Red turns to an unlikely source for help. Ressler faces an unexpected complication in his efforts to stay ahead of Agent Gale's investigation.

episodes.name: Mr. Kaplan
episodes.overview: In part one of the season finale, facing a crippling siege on his criminal organization, Red tracks a high-end thief enlisted by Mr. Kaplan for a mysterious assignment. Aram faces a difficult choice when Agent Gale takes extreme measures in his investigation into the Task Force's conduct.

episodes.name: Mr. Kaplan: Conclusion
episodes.overview: In the conclusion of the season finale, Red sets a risky plan in motion to save the Task Force and himself as Mr. Kaplan launches the final phase of her assault on his criminal empire. With the future of the Task Force in jeopardy, Liz confronts the biggest questions about her past.

episodes.name: Smokey Putnum
episodes.overview: Red enlists Liz in an unlikely plan to simultaneously earn cash and deliver a new Blacklister to the Task Force. Liz faces the new reality of working alongside her father. Ressler finds himself in a precarious position. Tom weighs his options.

episodes.name: Greyson Blaise
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force join Red on an international adventure in pursuit of a billionaire who moonlights as a high end art thief. Dembe chases a lead. Tom seeks outside help in identifying the remains in the suitcase.

episodes.name: Miss Rebecca Thrall
episodes.overview: Agent Ressler is distracted by increasing external pressures. Red drafts Tom in executing an elaborate plan to help re-establish his criminal reputation.

episodes.name: The Endling
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force hunt for an elusive criminal who will stop at nothing to destroy some of the world's most precious treasures. A surprise encounter leads a cash-strapped Red toward a new business opportunity. Tom takes action to investigate the bones in the suitcase.

episodes.name: Ilyas Surkov
episodes.overview: Red's intel puts Liz and the Task Force on a collision course with a rival unit from the CIA. Red and Hawkins lay the groundwork for their new business venture. Tom goes undercover in search of information.

episodes.name: The Travel Agency
episodes.overview: Ressler leads the Task Force on a mission to stop the resurgence of once-dormant murder-for-hire ring. Tom disregards a warning to halt his investigation into the suitcase.

episodes.name: The Kilgannon Corporation
episodes.overview: Red and the Task Force place Dembe undercover to infiltrate an international human smuggling organization. Tom's investigation into the suitcase lands him in grave danger.

episodes.name: Ian Garvey
episodes.overview: Tom goes missing and Liz desperately tries to find him. Red's hunt for the suitcase of bones puts him on a collision course with Tom that will change everyone's lives forever.

episodes.name: Ruin
episodes.overview: Liz abandons her old life and seeks out a fresh start in a place where no one knows her history, her name, or the depths of her grief. When an unexpected threat finds her, she is forced to draw on her emotional and physical strength in a brutal fight for survival.

episodes.name: The Informant
episodes.overview: When Red directs the Task Force to find a Blacklister who uses his position of power to sell sensitive information, Ressler finds himself at risk of exposure. Liz plans her next move.

episodes.name: Abraham Stern
episodes.overview: Red's hunt for a legendary treasure draws the attention of Abraham Stern, a cunning manipulator who believes the fortune is his birthright. Liz's quest sends her down a dark path, leading her to study the methods of one of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminals.

episodes.name: The Cook
episodes.overview: As Liz works with Red to hunt for Tom's killers, she begins to question his motives. The Task Force enlists the help of one arsonist to catch another.

episodes.name: The Invisible Hand
episodes.overview: When bodies are discovered in abandoned woods, Red points the Task Force toward The Invisible Hand, a group that targets those whose actions are morally reprehensible yet fully legal. Red steps in to assist one of his employees, and Liz discovers a major clue about Tom's investigation.

episodes.name: Mr. Raleigh Sinclair III
episodes.overview: Red assists the Task Force in tracking a mysterious Blacklister who carefully develops airtight alibis for murderous clients. Liz's reinstatement at the FBI hinges on an evaluation with a psychotherapist.

episodes.name: Pattie Sue Edwards
episodes.overview: As Liz works a new angle in tracking Tom's killers, Red looks to find a creative solution to a tax issue in his money laundering operation. Aram ventures into the field as the Task Force investigates a mysterious woman behind a deadly viral outbreak.

episodes.name: The Capricorn Killer
episodes.overview: As Liz investigates new details in a cold case from her early work as an FBI profiler, she explores her darker impulses in therapy with Dr. Fulton. The Task Force takes action to bring down Tom's killers within the legal system, while Red takes a different approach to closing in on Ian Garvey.

episodes.name: Anna-Gracia Duerte
episodes.overview: When an associate of the Nash Syndicate is murdered, Red sets Liz and the Task Force on the case in order to recover evidence crucial to bringing down Ian Garvey. Aram considers a step forward in his relationship with Samar.

episodes.name: Zarak Mosadek
episodes.overview: In an attempt to apply pressure to Ian Garvey, Red and the Task Force head to Paris to track down a prominent heroin supplier for the Nash Syndicate. Distrustful of Red's agenda, Liz takes her own path in going after Garvey.

episodes.name: Ian Garvey: Conclusion
episodes.overview: Liz uses intel from an unexpected source to force Red to uncover the secrets he holds. Red initiates a plan to retrieve the duffel bag of bones.

episodes.name: Nicholas T. Moore
episodes.overview: An unidentified young girl reappears and the team tries to find her connection to the secret Red is hiding. When her family steps in to protect their own secrets, the investigation turns into a race to save the girl's life.

episodes.name: Lawrence Dane Devlin
episodes.overview: Samar lands in the crosshairs of an unconventional Blacklister, and Aram and the task force spring into action to find her before it's too late.  Red journeys to Costa Rica to prevent the duffel bag of bones from being sold at an underground auction.

episodes.name: Sutton Ross
episodes.overview: Liz and Red face off in a climactic race to find a Blacklister in possession of the duffel bag of bones, forcing the truth about the bones to finally come to light.

episodes.name: Dr. Hans Koehler
episodes.overview: Red presents the Task Force with a Blacklist case searching for a plastic surgeon who creates new identities for wanted criminals. Liz and her sister, Jennifer, secretly investigate the events that took place the night the real Raymond Reddington died.

episodes.name: The Corsican
episodes.overview: As Liz and the Task Force race to stop an imminent bombing by an elusive Blacklister, Red has an encounter that will change the trajectory of his life forever.

episodes.name: The Pharmacist
episodes.overview: While Liz and the Task Force track a notorious underground biohacker, Red initiates a strategy to extricate himself from a problematic position. Cooper's integrity is tested with a difficult choice.

episodes.name: The Pawnbrokers
episodes.overview: Red acclimates to his new surroundings in federal prison, where he is challenged by an old rival. Samar goes undercover to stop a black market organization that fronts cash to criminals. Liz and Jennifer continue their investigation into Red's past.

episodes.name: Alter Ego
episodes.overview: While Red argues in court to uphold the validity of his immunity agreement, Liz and the Task Force question a man whose recent inheritance seems too good to be true and Dembe offers Red some advice.

episodes.name: The Ethicist
episodes.overview: When Red is sent to a federal medical institution following his request to the court for a psychiatric evaluation, Liz and Jennifer use his time away to search for a Blacklister they believe may have valuable information about Red’s past.

episodes.name: General Shiro
episodes.overview: Red and Dembe enlist Glen’s help in stacking the jury to Red’s advantage. The Task Force investigates a series of mysterious deaths resulting from weaponized insects.

episodes.name: Marko Jankowics
episodes.overview: Liz and Jennifer find themselves in the cross-hairs of a ruthless smuggler. Red mediates between two rival gangs in prison.

episodes.name: Minister D
episodes.overview: While Red fights in court to clear his name of treason once and for all, Liz and the Task Force investigate a Blacklister who has a reputation for leveraging dark secrets.

episodes.name: The Cryptobanker
episodes.overview: The Task Force delves into the unregulated world of cryptocurrency. Red undertakes a risky endeavor in order to secure his freedom.

episodes.name: Bastien Moreau
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force make a play to uncover the truth about an international assassination in a last-ditch effort to save Red’s life.

episodes.name: Bastien Moreau: Conclusion
episodes.overview: Cooper puts his reputation on the line to appeal to the White House on Red’s behalf, as Liz and the task force resume their search for The Corsican, a Blacklister with ties to an international conspiracy. Samar’s abilities in the field are tested.

episodes.name: Robert Vesco
episodes.overview: Red and the task force hunt for legendary fugitive Robert Vesco, one of history’s most notorious con men. Samar makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: The Osterman Umbrella Company
episodes.overview: Red directs Liz to investigate a secret organization of assassins hired by global intelligence agencies to eliminate former agents, a case with ramifications that will change the Task Force forever.

episodes.name: Olivia Olson
episodes.overview: The Task Force searches for a woman who specializes in hostile takeovers of criminal organizations, and may have intelligence connected to an international conspiracy involving presidential advisor Anna McMahon. Aram enacts a daring plan to gain leverage over Red.

episodes.name: Lady Luck
episodes.overview: Liz and Ressler investigate a Blacklister who offers to erase gambling debts at a deceptively high price. Dembe grows concerned as Red tests the loyalties of their business associates in search of the individual who turned him in to the police.

episodes.name: The Third Estate
episodes.overview: Red and the Task Force spring into action to stop an anti-capitalist terrorist group from kidnapping and torturing the children of the one percent. Ressler goes behind Liz's back to find out what happened to her mother, former KGB operative Katarina Rostova.

episodes.name: The Brockton College Killer
episodes.overview: When a frozen corpse is discovered in the woods, the Task Force is drawn into the investigation of an old case that has gained notoriety due to a popular true crime podcast. Red visits Dom Wilkinson for help making a difficult decision. Ressler makes a discovery about Katarina Rostova’s past.

episodes.name: Rassvet
episodes.overview: Alone in a foreign country after a mission goes catastrophically wrong, Katarina Rostova goes on the run to avoid the forces trying to hunt her down. Isolated and out of options, she seeks out the only person she trusts: a man who has vowed to always protect her.

episodes.name: Guillermo Rizal
episodes.overview: When multiple children are abducted under similar circumstances, the Task Force rushes to find the kidnapper. Red goes on the hunt for a man who can find anything. Liz considers a big change.

episodes.name: Anna McMahon
episodes.overview: Presidential adviser Anna McMahon faces off with Cooper and the task force in a winner-takes-all race to locate the missing dossier containing details of a conspiracy against America.

episodes.name: Robert Diaz
episodes.overview: As the president’s true plan comes into focus, Liz and the task force fight to avert disaster. Red meets in secret with a man who holds information about his past.

episodes.name: Louis T. Steinhil
episodes.overview: After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond finds himself alone in hostile territory unsure of who—if anyone—he can trust. With few leads to go on, Liz and the Task Force venture into unknown danger as they race to find him.

episodes.name: Louis T. Steinhil: Conclusion
episodes.overview: Liz, Dembe and the Task Force continue to search for Red, who attempts to escape his abductors with help from a surprise ally, but discovers he is not Katarina Rostova’s only target in her hunt for information.

episodes.name: Les Fleurs du Mal
episodes.overview: Aram goes undercover to infiltrate a secret society of wealthy thrill-seekers whose entertainment hinges upon spectacular acts of violence. Red tries to negotiate with a former associate involved in the Townsend Directive. Katarina Rostova takes steps to insinuate herself into Liz’s life.

episodes.name: Kuwait
episodes.overview: Cooper’s moral compass is tested when an officer whom he served with as a young man, long presumed to be dead, resurfaces as a POW.

episodes.name: Norman Devane
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force investigate an infamous assassin who has a long history of weaponizing diseases, but has now turned to even more insidious activities. Red and Dembe travel to Cuba in search of a lead. Aram considers a new relationship.

episodes.name: Dr. Lewis Powell
episodes.overview: Red alerts the FBI to the suspicious death of a scientist specializing in artificial intelligence research. Francesca Campbell further entangles herself in Red’s criminal activities.

episodes.name: Hannah Hayes
episodes.overview: The Task Force investigates the unexplained disappearance and sudden re-emergence of a governor. Red and Dembe surveil someone close to Katarina Rostova, as she inadvertently involves Agnes in an operation of her own.

episodes.name: The Hawaladar
episodes.overview: Desperate for information about the whereabouts of a longtime friend, Red directs the Task Force to find a Blacklister who specializes in untraceable money transfers. Liz receives some disturbing news from her daughter.

episodes.name: Orion Relocation Services
episodes.overview: Red and Liz investigate Orion Relocation Services, an organization that surreptitiously facilitates the disappearance and relocation of criminals. Katarina delves into the memories of an old friend in order to get additional information about the Townsend Directive.

episodes.name: Katarina Rostova
episodes.overview: Red and the Task Force pay a visit to a former Blacklister as an explosive confrontation leads Liz to make a critical choice.

episodes.name: Victoria Fenberg
episodes.overview: With the help of the Task Force, Red tracks a gifted art forger who has thwarted his plans to sell stolen pieces. Aram’s love life becomes increasingly complicated. Liz and Ressler confide in each other.

episodes.name: Cornelius Ruck
episodes.overview: Secluded on a private island, Red reunites with an old flame and a ring of thieves in a plot to make millions off stolen art. However, plans are quickly derailed when guests on the island mysteriously show up dead.

episodes.name: Newton Purcell
episodes.overview: The Task Force investigates a series of attacks on data centers perpetrated by a Blacklister with a peculiar condition, as Liz conducts a secret investigation on the side. Glen desperately tries to prove his value to Red after a shipping mishap.

episodes.name: Twamie Ullulaq
episodes.overview: A Blacklist case becomes personal for Agent Park when the team investigates a mysterious disappearance in the Alaska Triangle. Aram enlists Red’s help to find out what really happened to Elodie’s husband.

episodes.name: Gordon Kemp
episodes.overview: A Blacklist case forces Liz to choose sides between Red and the Task Force. Red tries to calm a panicked Ilya Koslov, who believes he is under surveillance.

episodes.name: Nyle Hatcher
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force take on a cold case that may have some new victims. Red tries to help a friend of Dembe who is in danger.

episodes.name: Brothers
episodes.overview: Ressler is forced to confront past trauma and family secrets when his brother takes him back home for a risky job.

episodes.name: Roy Cain
episodes.overview: As the Task Force investigates a kidnapping executed by seemingly impossible abductors, Dembe lands in a perilous situation. A recent health scare causes Red to think about a successor.

episodes.name: The Kazanjian Brothers
episodes.overview: The Task Force investigates an accountant who works for lucrative criminals in order to find the violent and thuggish brothers hired for his protection. Meanwhile, Liz must make a momentous decision.

episodes.name: Roanoke
episodes.overview: Red directs the Task Force to investigate Roanoke, a legendary criminal who orchestrates elaborate extractions. Liz works to hatch a secret plan with her mother, Katarina Rostova.

episodes.name: Katarina Rostova: Conclusion
episodes.overview: As Liz pushes a source for answers, Red and the task force grapple with the implications of her actions. Tensions boil over and a drastic action is taken, which will change Red and Liz's relationship forever.

episodes.name: 16 Ounces
episodes.overview: Fueled by his betrayal, Elizabeth Keen seeks vengeance on Reddington.

episodes.name: Elizabeth Keen
episodes.overview: As Red and the task force search for Liz, she sets a new plan in motion that has catastrophic consequences.

episodes.name: The Fribourg Confidence
episodes.overview: The task force investigates an organization of bank robbers with a special expertise in stealing from other criminals. An old blacklist case resurfaces.

episodes.name: The Wellstone Agency
episodes.overview: Red and Dembe go to great lengths to fulfill the final wishes of a dear friend. Aram goes undercover as an interpreter to a company that provides services to criminals. Park helps a friend in trouble.

episodes.name: Chemical Mary
episodes.overview: The task force must race to stop simultaneous danger presented by two blacklisters. Cooper approaches a congressman for intel.

episodes.name: Ogden Greeley
episodes.overview: The Task Force investigates the apparent disappearance of a defense contractor. Cooper receives an unexpected offer and Red makes a connection.

episodes.name: The Cyranoid
episodes.overview: The Task Force is thrown for a loop when they encounter a nefarious enterprise that provides doppelgängers for criminals. Red scrambles to counteract a bold move by Liz.

episodes.name: Dr. Laken Perillos
episodes.overview: Red and Dembe land in peril when Townsend deploys a torture specialist who uses unorthodox methods to interrogate her victims.

episodes.name: Captain Kidd
episodes.overview: The task force attempts to stop an abduction by searching for a treasure man who uses geocaching to hide illicit goods and facilitate transactions between otherwise warring criminal factions.

episodes.name: Rakitin
episodes.overview: The task force's determination to identify a Russian asset in the U.S. government puts Cooper and Reddington in increasingly treacherous positions.

episodes.name: Anne
episodes.overview: Red enjoys a quiet visit with a friend at her home in rural America.

episodes.name: Misère
episodes.overview: In a retrospective look at key turning points, steps are retraced that lead Liz to align with a powerful enemy.

episodes.name: The Russian Knot
episodes.overview: The task force hatches a plan to steal a Soviet-era cipher machine needed to decrypt coded messages. Townsend puts Liz's loyalty to the test. Red and Dembe are called to an unexpected meeting.

episodes.name: Nicholas Obenrader
episodes.overview: Liz and the Task Force track new leads in their investigation of N-13. Red takes steps to infiltrate Townsend's criminal organization.

episodes.name: Ivan Stepanov
episodes.overview: Red tries desperately to rescue an old friend at all costs. Liz and Townsend conduct an interrogation.

episodes.name: The Protean
episodes.overview: The task force springs into action to stop an elusive assassin on Liz's trail.

episodes.name: Balthazar 'Bino' Baker
episodes.overview: Hoping to move some precious cargo quietly, Red enlists the assistance of an enforcer who specializes in transporting items through an underground network.

episodes.name: Godwin Page
episodes.overview: Liz, Red and Dembe are forced to work together to survive an attack from Townsend. Cooper and the task force attempt to de-escalate the increasing danger to all.

episodes.name: Nachalo
episodes.overview: When Reddington takes Liz to the mysterious epicenter of his empire, their shared past reveals itself and long-buried secrets are divulged.

episodes.name: Konets
episodes.overview: Reddington makes a disturbing request to Liz in exchange for the truth about his identity.

episodes.name: The Skinner
episodes.overview: In the two years following Elizabeth Keen's death, Reddington and the task force have disbanded, with Red's whereabouts unknown. But when one of their own is injured in the line of duty, they are drawn back together to bring down a global conspiracy.

episodes.name: The Skinner: Conclusion
episodes.overview: A kidnapping poses a test for the capabilities of the task force as they contend with a mysterious pirating organization.

episodes.name: The SPK
episodes.overview: A new case involving stolen artifacts reunites Red with a former Blacklister. Aram faces a difficult decision.

episodes.name: The Avenging Angel
episodes.overview: The Task Force races to locate a Blacklister who uses any means necessary to return what has been unjustly stolen. Ressler asks Park for a favor. Cooper tries to piece together an event for which he has no memory.

episodes.name: Benjamin T. Okara
episodes.overview: Dembe's position as an FBI agent causes complications for Red as the task force handles a case involving military technology. Cooper and Park each find their personal lives increasingly complicated.

episodes.name: Dr. Roberta Sand, Ph.D.
episodes.overview: The task force investigates a therapist who may be the key to the resurgence of an organized crime family. Red conducts an investigation of his own.

episodes.name: Between Sleep and Awake
episodes.overview: In a series of flashbacks, Donald Ressler recalls his actions in the aftermath of Elizabeth Keen's death.

episodes.name: Dr. Razmik Meier
episodes.overview: The death of a professional tennis player leads the task force to a doctor who may be fixing the odds for a major sports betting syndicate. Red digs deeper into Dembe's betrayal. Ressler struggles with sobriety.

episodes.name: Boukman Baptiste
episodes.overview: A spate of coordinated attacks on Red’s lieutenants puts Dembe in imminent danger, prompting him to relive the events that led him to join the FBI two years earlier.

episodes.name: Arcane Wireless
episodes.overview: The task force's investigation into Arcane Wireless, an untraceable cellular network for criminals, leads to unexpected consequences. Red races against the clock to get a colleague out of trouble.

episodes.name: The Conglomerate
episodes.overview: An investigation into the Conglomerate, a group of former government-sponsored assassins, becomes complicated when the task force learns one of their own may have ties to the group. Red digs deeper into the events leading up to Liz's death.

episodes.name: The Chairman
episodes.overview: The Task Force pursues their latest target, the Chairman, who operates a dark web stock market trading shares of criminal organizations. Red takes extreme measures to locate a tracking device, which sends Ressler into a spiral. Cooper makes contact with his blackmailer.

episodes.name: Genuine Models, Inc.
episodes.overview: The task force is led to an unusual suspect when the clients of an escort service start turning up dead. Red and a friend try to recover an item after reuniting at a friend's memorial. Cooper heads to Atlanta to follow a lead on his blackmailer.

episodes.name: Eva Mason
episodes.overview: While searching for Sen. Panabaker's missing daughter-in-law, the task force learns there may be a larger pattern of abductions. Red continues piecing together the mystery behind Liz's death.

episodes.name: Andrew Kennison
episodes.overview: Tensions rise when Cooper’s search for his blackmailer overlaps with the Task Force’s latest Blacklist case.

episodes.name: Helen Maghi
episodes.overview: Red chases a lead that could shed light on both Liz's death and Cooper's blackmailing. The task force experiences a major shake-up when one of their own is taken into custody.

episodes.name: El Conejo
episodes.overview: When a member of The Task Force is captured by the leader of a cartel, they turn to Red for guidance. Red investigates a seemingly impossible heist.

episodes.name: Laszlo Jankowics
episodes.overview: Red questions the whereabouts of a former associate; the task force hunts down a criminal dealing in illegal psychedelics.

episodes.name: The Bear Mask
episodes.overview: Feeling the weight of recent pressures, Aram turns to an unusual outlet for release.

episodes.name: Caelum Bank
episodes.overview: In an effort to reveal his true enemy, Red turns to the Task Force to help ground a flying fortress bank.

episodes.name: Marvin Gerard: Conclusion (1)
episodes.overview: Red and the task force spring into action after learning who betrayed them.

episodes.name: Marvin Gerard: Conclusion (2)
episodes.overview: Red and Cooper square off with conflicting endgames for their mutual traitor. A major secret about the task force falls into the wrong hands.
